mapper.select: select student.Sname,student.Ssex,student.Cnu,t.Tname,d.Dname,c.Cname,student.Sbirth,student.Sette,student.Scredit,student.Snu FROM student INNER JOIN class c on student.Cnu = c.Cnu INNER JOIN teacher t on c.Tnu = t.Tnu INNER join department d on c.Dnu = d.Dnu where Snu = #{Snu}
